definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קסם]] (√ of foll.; appar. orig. divide, assign (deity), Ar. qasama, divide, distribute, x. get a part allotted to oneself, especially by drawing lots [with headless arrows] at sanctuary (cf. esp. Ez Eze 21:26, Eze 21:27; IV. 0’aqsama swear; v. also Eth.qasama: IV. use divination, so Targum [[קְסַם]] Syr. qs.am; [[קִיסְמָא]] divination; see esp. RS JPhil. xiii (1885), 276 ff, We Skizzen iii, 127 f. 167; Heid. 2.132 ff. Dr De 18:10)
